title: Ski-In-Ski-Out Luxury in the French Alps
description: Experience the thrill of skiing at one of the world’s best ski resorts - Val d'Isère in the French Alps - with a five-night stay at the luxurious Relais & Châteaux Hotel Les Barmes De l’Ours, just steps away from the ski lifts. This skiers' dream escape includes daily breakfast, nightly multi-course dinners to be enjoyed at multiple on-site restaurants, a welcome drink and generous discounts on ski gear rental and spa treatments.
offer_address: Chemin des Carats, 73150 Val dʼIsère, France
